base_description: White, three-piece faucet with vintage design.
part_description: Includes a curved spout and two cross-handle knobs. The spout is centrally positioned, with handles symmetrically placed on either side.
internal_interaction_description: The handles control water flow through the spout. Turning the handles adjusts the internal valves, regulating the mix of hot and cold water that passes through the central spout.
external_interaction_description: The faucet is installed on a sink or countertop. Users interact by turning the handles to release water. It connects to plumbing for hot and cold water supply, dispensing water through the spout into a basin.
